titleStmt.title: Cyrus the Great, or, The tragedy of love as it is acted at the theatre in Little-Lincoln's-Inn-Fields, by His Majesty's servants / written by John Banks.
titleStmt.author: Banks, John, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Verso of last leaf contains lists of plays written by Mr. Banks, by Mr. Lee, and by Mr. Otway.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
